# Guidance Scale

The CFG scale from Stable Diffusion community. The difference is that Fooocus implemented an adaptive TSNR rescaling so that results will be less burned when scale is high (like bigger than 15).

[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/272352764-1ec68a26-62f4-4bd6-95dc-66c90fac8348.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Nk0OOMUQ8MiZqS7QzDiE-B4TBwVaLQm2-p-lB3ce9xM)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/272352764-1ec68a26-62f4-4bd6-95dc-66c90fac8348.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Nk0OOMUQ8MiZqS7QzDiE-B4TBwVaLQm2-p-lB3ce9xM)

# Fooocus V2 Style (Added 2023 Sep 11)

Fooocus V2 Style allows users to combine multiple styles at the same time. The combination algorithm of the styles is carefully prepared so that adding multiples styles will not decease the image quality.

Users can often get very high-quality images by combining multiple styles.

[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/267226756-7a63cc06-07fe-402b-adf9-45779414343a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..umAt4Ck9qED29ayklUWOUDCc9LMvSY54Xv2l3_F0syY)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/267226756-7a63cc06-07fe-402b-adf9-45779414343a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..umAt4Ck9qED29ayklUWOUDCc9LMvSY54Xv2l3_F0syY)

Among all those styles the “Fooocus V2” is a very unique dynamic style that use AI (actually it is a GPT2) to adaptively adding styles to make the image more appealing:

[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/267227121-f1acf65c-79bd-49cd-8b2f-236ca13cc663.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..k93G08e_CdeNniwwBP-ejwYohSYZ-UcOD5Ewy1vgdQE)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/267227121-f1acf65c-79bd-49cd-8b2f-236ca13cc663.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..k93G08e_CdeNniwwBP-ejwYohSYZ-UcOD5Ewy1vgdQE)

The “Fooocus V2” style can be viewed as a smart prompt expansion. We provide examples below.

**Note that you may see in console some texts generated by expansion. Those texts are handled in a unique way that is different from your written prompts. In most cases you do not need to worry about these generated keywords influencing your main prompts.**

### A Quick Comparison for the style "Fooocus V2"

Prompt: Statue of God

[![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/267488160-4cb0c622-6840-45b2-be79-4805f3169a6a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..MpsRtGwReV99kgjlhE1LOcHYwCZkmk6OSF8fXbUaHKQ)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/19834515/267488160-4cb0c622-6840-45b2-be79-4805f3169a6a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..MpsRtGwReV99kgjlhE1LOcHYwCZkmk6OSF8fXbUaHKQ)
